children.name: CONTROL TECHNOLOGY CORP. (hereinafter referred to as “we”) set forth the Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as “Privacy Policy”) for the handling of information of users (hereinafter referred to as the “Users”) of services and websites we provide (hereinafter collectively referred to as the “Services”).

“Personal Information” refers to information related to an identified or identifiable natural person, such as name, business address, e-mail address, phone number, date of birth, company or organization name which Users belong to.
Users agree to Privacy Policy by expressing User’s intention to consent to Privacy Policy. Users may also withdraw User’s consent to this Privacy Policy at any time.
However, if Users withdraw User’s consent, Users will not be able to use the Services (or functions) that require us to use information we obtain based on User’s consent.
In addition, when any of Users under 18 years of age uses Services, the guardian must give consent to the use of Services or obtain approval from the guardian before agreeing to use the Services.
We obtain the following information. However, These are not acquired through Zoom integration.
Information obtained directly from Users through User’s registration of Service or any change in the registered information, or through inquiries from Users are below.
Article 4 (Purpose of Use of Personal Information)
Article 4 (Purpose of Use of Personal Information)

We use acquired Personal Information for the following purposes. Any Personal Information is not used beyond this scope unless laws or regulations related to Personal Information allows or a user himself / herself agrees.
• Business To respond to inquiries and inquiries regarding Services
Business To respond to inquiries and inquiries regarding Services
• For information on our products and Services, etc. (Includes the delivery of our e-mail newsletter.)
For information on our products and Services, etc. (Includes the delivery of our e-mail newsletter.)
• To respond to acts that violate our terms of use regarding Services
To respond to acts that violate our terms of use regarding Services
• To notify you of changes in terms of use regarding Services
To notify you of changes in terms of use regarding Services
• To help improve Services, develop new services, etc.
To help improve Services, develop new services, etc.
• To create statistical data related to Services that is processed into a form that cannot identify individuals.
To create statistical data related to Services that is processed into a form that cannot identify individuals.
• In addition, for the purposes incidental to the above purposes
In addition, for the purposes incidental to the above purposes
Article 5 (Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties)
Article 5 (Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties)
Personal data（Personal Information）will not be provided to third parties except in cases stipulated in Article 27 of JAPAN Act on the Protection of Personal Information.

And When Users uses an external service that cooperation with Services, Personal Information is provided to cooperation operator related to the external service to the extent necessary to carry out cooperation with the external service. In that case, the cooperation operator will manage the Personal Information.
Also, Personal Information stored by us might be used jointly with our business partner who works with us to provide Services, within the minimum range necessary for operating Services.
When we process Personal Information, we take appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure appropriate security.

We implement appropriate management of Personal Information through measures against unauthorized access and vulnerability, appointment of a person responsible for the management of Personal Information, and education of our employees.
We will retain your Personal Information for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

We may collect access log and other data as the statistical information that cannot identify individuals to improve Services in the future and investigate the use trend of Services. The statistical data concerned shall not be included in Personal Information stipulated by Privacy Policy.

Services uses cookie, web beacon, and other technologies to understand the use trend, efficiently operate the advertisement, inflow from search engines, and maintain temporary information. Information saved in cookie does not include Personal Information itself. Also, please note this: if cookie is set to invalid, most of the functions of this Services may be disabled.

On websites or services provided by companies other than ours linked from Services, such companies may acquire Personal Information, but this does not apply to Privacy Policy, and we do not assume any obligations or responsibilities for these business to acquire information.
For inquiries about the handling of Personal Information, or other questions concerning Privacy Policy, please contact us on
We may revise Privacy Policy and you shall accept it. Except as otherwise provided by us, any and shall become effective at the time of such posting.
Chief Executive Officer and Chief Privacy Officer: Shuichi Tanimoto
